snippet.title: Moonglow Bay | Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Moonglow Bay is a relaxing slice-of-life fishing RPG launching on Steam,  Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One Consoles, Xbox Game Pass for Console & Xbox Game Pass for PC in 2021.

In Moonglow Bay, you play as a rookie angler, working together with friends, family, and neighbours to hone your fishing skills, nourish relationships, and restore a remote town’s fractured community.

Embark on a deep and touching story as you seek to fulfil your partner’s final wish in a town on the verge of bankruptcy.

Wishlist us on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1361400/Moonglow_Bay/
Wishlist us on Epic - https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/moonglow-bay

Learn more about Moonglow Bay at https://moonglowbay.com

Follow us @ https://twitter.com/moonglowbay

Join the community on https://discord.gg/coatsink

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

More from Coatsink - https://coatsink.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Coatsink
Instagram: https://twitter.com/Coatsink
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/developer/coatsink

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BunnyhugGames
Discord: https://discord.gg/K8sknEx
